5. Clue 6 tells us that the person driving the scooter is a fan of hip-hop and must be on one end (from clue 15). Since the person playing video-games is already paired with raspberry, this means that the fan of hip-hop must be at the left end.
6. From clues 2 and 7, we know that the person eating pumpkin is on either side of the person rock-climbing or the fan of blues. Clue 17 tells us that the fan of blues drives a bus, so this means that the person eating pumpkin must be next to the person driving the bus.
7. The remaining clues were used to fill in the gaps and ensure that all conditions were met.
